summary: Web application with admin login functionality
known_issues: Admin login not accessible from landing page

existing_features.title: Add a prominent login button to the dashboard landing page (DashboardPage.tsx) that triggers Internet Identity authentication for admin access
Position the login button in a prominent location on the dashboard page, such as the top-right area near the statistics cards or in the header section
Reuse the existing LoginButton component from frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx for consistent authentication behavior across the application

new_feature_requests.summary: Add admin login button on landing page
